hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin Yazid said:"I sqa Ibn Masud stone Jamratul 'Aqabah from the bottom of the valley, then he said: ;This - by the One beside Whom there is no other God-is the place where the one to whom Surat Al-Baqarah was revealed stood

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَكَانِ الَّذِي تُرْمَى مِنْهُ جَمْرَةُ الْعَقَبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Place From Which Jamratul 'Aqabah Is To Be Stoned
